column5: Well had a few days off Lake Erie this week so decided to try and get out and find a Toronto Sun Derby Winner ...fishing has been awesome for us  over the past couple days with many teenage fish ..Bern had a 27lber today a new personal Best for her way to go Bern you fought that fish like a champ ...fish could have made the Top 10 but figured with all the Big fish being caught this week wasn't worth the drive to Grimsby to weigh it in ...back to Walleye fishing for 2 more days then Back to the Kings last week of the Sun ...been on the water now over 30 days straight man i love fishing ever day ... ;D Thanks again Bill for taken us away from Lake Erie for a few day ..see ya Thursday and lets get that 40lber
Very nice. Congrats to Bern on her PB. Did the fish make it in the top 10?
Way to go, nice fish.  Congrats to Bern  Joey
Way to go ! Those are some pretty hefty fish.Gotta love the salmon battle. Dan
Great fish,,,sorry they wern't a couple pounds heavier!! But at least your catchin the big ones!  congrats bern!
Great report and pics Fishmaster Congrats to Bern for her PB  Thansk for sharing Leechman

Thanks for the congrats guys.  This season has been totally awesome for me personally with one fish after another.  I would have made number 10 on the list but I knew that there would be bigger fish caught... Although it would have been awesome to send a copy of it to my Brother... hehehe  A couple of days more to fish before the Derby is over... one never knows what will come next...  Life doesn't get any better when out on the water enjoying every moment that passes.  Cheers Jen
Fish are starting to look darker...not too long until I can drift skein in the harbour and battle a king with 150 yards of line out on the pin!  What a rush!  great fish
nice report guys...good break from the Erie eyes, and nice to see a "fun fish" report..Erie been a bit bumpy anyways
Great report steve!!!,nice fish too,and congrats to jen on her ne PB salmon !!! ..cheers
Great kings guy. Gotta love the 3 fly rigs.
Thats just AWESOME!...thanks for sharing. I love fishing everyday too!
